channel.title: Documentation on Tinkle
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Tinkle

item.title: Getting Started
item.description:
System requirements

  • macOS 13 Ventura or later

Installation

  1. Download dmg file from here.
  2. Open a downloaded dmg file.
  3. Move Tinkle.app into Applications.
  4. Open Tinkle from Apps.
  5. Accessibility Access dialog will be shown.
    Click the Open System Settings button.
    (Tinkle uses the accessibility features in order to detect the focused window changes.)
  6. Enable Tinkle on System Settings > Privacy & Security > Accessibility.
  7. Finished!
    A visual effect is shown when you change the focused window while Tinkle is running.

What’s next?

  • Configuration

item.title: Pricing
item.description: Tinkle is an open source software and you can use it without any purchases.
